_sText:
Red Vs. Blue 

Red Team (terrorists) - kill Blue Team using Red Crates to hurt them. 
Blue Team (counter terrorists) kill Red Tem using Blue Crates to hurt them. 

Spawn with: Usp, Knife, He Grenade. 

Red Crates: hurt counter terrorists but not terrorists. 
Blue Crates: hust terrorists but not counter terrorists. 
Purple Crate: give you full life for both teams. 

Caution-Caution: the floors will break and you will die if you fall! 

Notes: 
- the crates move very fast when shot, watch out! 
- if a crate is flying fast, no matter what color, get out of the way!
- you have 15 seconds to leave spawn!
- in game textures look alot better, my screenshot program sucks :( 
- made by Dan. 

Thanks to SmOoth for the player color help.

P.S.   - Have fun -
